showScoreExcerpt:
Jocelyn Bioh’s inviting workplace comedy…would be a shoo-in for two separate Tony Awards, if either existed – one for hair and wig design, the other for ensemble acting.
The cast of ten, most of them making their Broadway debuts, bring us into the swirling world of struggling West African immigrants, and their hairstyles…The darkness, while sudden, is not wrongheaded, and so much else about “Jaja’s African Hair Braiding” is so right. 

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: so much else about 'Jaja's African Hair Braiding' is so right
